text: Rero Umuremyi wiwe yaramwakiriye neza atako aramukuza neza aca agira intumwa y’Imana Zakariya (iii) ngo abe umurezi w’ico kibondo, n’ingene intumwa y’Imana Zakariya (iii) yinjira mucumba c’iwe yahasanga ibifungurwa ari kumwe na Mariyamu (iii) aca avuga ati:- ewe Mariyamu (iii) ibi bintu vyose ubironkeye hehe? Nawe yamwishura ati:- ibi vyose bivuye ku Mana, n’Imana iha uwo yishakiye utarinze kugiriranira ibiharuro
